text: Miss South Sudan or Miss World South Sudan is a Beauty pageant in South Sudan. ==History== The Miss World qualifying pageant launched in 2011, the year South Sudan gained independence from Sudan. What began with 20 applicants from around the country and the diaspora has now grown to about 60. The first round of auditions for this year's event will begin in the coming weeks, with the winner to be announced in August. The new Miss South Sudan will compete for the global title of Miss World. == Titleholders == ::The winner of Miss South Sudan represents her country at Miss World. On occasion, when the winner does not qualify (due to age) for either contest, a contestant is sent.{{cite web|url=http://www.missworld.com/Contestants/SouthSudan/ |title=Archived copy |accessdate=2012-08-12 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120722233352/http://www.missworld.com/Contestants/SouthSudan/ |archivedate=22 July 2012 } Asara Bullen Panchol {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 92%; text-align:center" !width="60" style="background- color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Year !width="250" style="background- color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"| !width="250" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Placement !width="230" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"| |- |-style="background-color:#FFFF66;" ! 2012 | Atong Demach | Top 7 | * Miss World Africa * Miss World Top Model |-bgcolor="lightgrey" ! 2013 | Manuela Modong | Unplaced | None |-style="background-color:#FFFACD" ! 2014 | Awien Kuanyin-Agoth | Top 25 | None |-style="background-color:#FFFACD" ! 2015 | Ajaa Kiir Monchol | Top 20 | None |-bgcolor="lightgrey" ! 2016 | Akuany Ayuen | Unplaced | None |-bgcolor="lightgrey" ! 2017 | Arual Longar | Unplaced | None |-bgcolor="lightgrey" ! 2018 | Florence Thompson | Unplaced | None |-bgcolor="lightgrey" ! 2019 | Mariah Nyayiena | Unplaced | Miss World Top Model (Top 40) |- ! 2020 | colspan=4 |- ! 2021 | TBA | TBA | TBA |- |} ==See also== * Miss Earth South Sudan ==References== South Sudan South Sudan South Sudan Category:South Sudanese awards
